title: BrainyQuote Scraper
description: Collect motivational and topic-based quotes from BrainyQuote using an API-first approach with HTML fallback and pagination.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Optional BrainyQuote topic or quote URLs to scrape in addition to topic pagination.

topic.title: Primary topic
topic.description: Topic slug without the '-quotes' suffix (e.g., motivational, success, happiness).

author.title: Author
author.description: Search for quotes by a specific author (e.g., 'Albert Einstein').

url.title: URL
url.description: Specific BrainyQuote URL to scrape (e.g., a topic or author page).

topics.title: Additional topics
topics.description: Optional list of topics to scrape in one run. Values are slugified automatically.

maxPages.title: Max pages per topic
maxPages.description: How many paginated pages to visit per topic (including the first page).

maxItems.title: Max quotes to collect
maxItems.description: Stop after saving this many quotes across all topics and start URLs.

preferApi.title: Prefer BrainyQuote API
preferApi.description: Use BrainyQuote's internal API endpoints first, then fall back to HTML pages when needed.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure Apify Proxy. Datacenter proxy is sufficient for this target.
